title: New EV Battery Aims to Last Shocking Amount of Miles for Less Money
description: The world’s largest battery company, CATL, has designed its new electric vehicle (EV) battery made from salt to last up to 3.6 million miles. This product, officially named Naxtra, is the world’s first mass-produced sodium-ion battery. The battery was initially announced in April, but information ...

descriptionSummary: CATL, a pioneering leader in battery technology, has unveiled its cutting-edge EV battery made from salt-based materials. Dubbed Naxtra, this revolutionary sodium-ion battery boasts an impressive lifespan of up to 3.6 million miles, setting a new standard for the industry.

title: Infiniti Reveals Powerful QX80 Track And Terrain Concepts To Preview One New Vehicle
description: The full-size luxury SUV space is highly competitive, and the Infiniti QX80 is proof, with sales in the United States varying above and below the five-figure mark over the last five years. But Infiniti is taking action. After releasing the new QX80 Sport for 2026 last week with additional luxury ...

descriptionSummary: The full-size luxury SUV market has been a crowded space in recent years, with the Infiniti QX80 experiencing fluctuating sales that have sometimes dipped below $100,000. To revamp its flagship model, Infiniti has just introduced the 2026 QX80 Sport with enhanced luxury features.

title: Ford Offers Compelling 2025 Escape PHEV Lease Deal For August
description: The Ford Escape has carved out a place in the crowded compact SUV segment by offering a blend of practicality, comfort, and tech. In its plug-in hybrid (PHEV) form, it adds the benefit of electric-only driving for short trips while keeping the gas engine for longer journeys — an attractive middle ...

Its plug-in hybrid model takes this to the next level with electric propulsion for urban excursions and a gasoline backup for extended road trips.

title: Infiniti QX65 Monograph Previews A New Mid-Size Luxury Crossover Coming Soon
description: From 2002 until 2013, Infiniti sold the FX crossover in place of the QX4 as its mid-size luxury SUV, and until 2017, effectively the same recipe continued under the QX70 name. descriptionSummary: After bowing out of the luxury SUV scene in 2013, Infiniti is reviving its mid-size presence with a sleek new offering. The QX65 Monograph made its debut at Monterey Car Week, marking the brand's return to the coupe crossover market.

description: Almost a year after the Lucid Gravity went into production, the EV maker is exploring a number of unique applications for the large SUV. title: Global EV Sales Growth Slows to 21% in July as China Pauses Subsidies
description: July’s electric vehicle sales numbers brought a reality check for the industry. That’s still solid, but it’s also the slowest growth rate since ...

descriptionSummary: Electric vehicle sales showed a moderate pace in July, with plug-in car deliveries increasing 21% globally compared to last year, according to Rho Motion's latest research. Growth is steady, yet the industry's momentum has begun to plateau.
